text:
Various changes were made to the build.xml file in the 1.2 cvs branch, mainly 
to generate 1.1 compatible byte code using the jdk 1.4 javac.  Compare the 1.2 
build.xml and move over needed changes to the main cvs branch.
creator: mwomack@apache.org
carnold@apache.org
text: log4j 1.3 is abandoned and this issue appears to be maintenance regarding log4j 1.3 build.xml.
